attributes.documentation: Emitted when a stake or unstakeDelay are initialized or increased
attributes.name: StakeAdded

attributes.documentation: Emitted once a stake is scheduled for withdrawal
attributes.name: StakeUnlocked

attributes.documentation: Emitted when owner withdraws relayManager funds
attributes.name: StakeWithdrawn

attributes.documentation: Emitted when an authorized Relay Hub penalizes a relayManager
attributes.name: StakePenalized
stakeForAddress
penalizeRelayManager

params.beneficiary: - address that receives half of the penalty amount

params.relayManager: - address that represents a stake entry and controls relay registrations on relay hubs
params.unstakeDelay: - number of blocks to elapse before the owner can retrieve the stake after calling 'unlock'

penalizeRelayManager(address,address,uin.notice: Slash the stake of the relay relayManager. In order to prevent stake kidnapping, burns half of stake on the way.

stakeForAddress(address,uint256).notice: Put a stake for a relayManager and set its unstake delay. If the entry does not exist, it is created, and the caller of this function becomes its owner. If the entry already exists, only the owner can call this function.
